headline: Clorox Expands Partnership with Realize the Dream to Mobilize Employee Volunteer Service Globally
summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE: CLX) today announced its expanded partnership with Realize the Dream, a national service initiative honoring Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.'s message of connecting people through service. The new Clorox initiative, Every Hour Counts, is a multi-year commitment to mobilize thousands of employees globally toward Realize the Dream's ambitious goal of 100 million volunteer hours by 2029, coinciding with Dr. King's 100th birthday.
